en.answer: In this situation, since a "Nekroz" monster is being targeted by a card effect, the effect of <<11485>> be activated from the hand.
en.question: If the effect of <<10437>> in the Graveyard is activated by targeting 1 face-up "Nekroz" monster, can the effect of <<11485>> be activated from the hand?
en.title: If the effect of <<10437>> in the Graveyard is activated by targeting 1 face-up "Nekroz" monster, can the effect of <<11485>> be activated from the hand?
